text: COURT OF AUDITORS Special Report 20/2020 ‘Combatting child poverty – Better targeting of Commission support required’ (2020/C 325/13) The European Court of Auditors hereby informs you that Special Report 20/2020 ‘Combating child poverty – Better targeting of Commission support required’ has just been published. The report can be accessed for consultation or downloading on the European Court of Auditors’ website: http://eca.europa.eu EN Official Journal of the European Union 2.10.2020 C 325/23
